snippet: For the second straight year, the Grand Prix of America was removed from Formula One’s calendar, but its promoters remained upbeat.
abstract: Formula One again delays its expansion into the United States market, dropping a proposed race in New Jersey from the 2014 schedule.
lead_paragraph: For the second straight year, the Grand Prix of America was removed from Formula One’s calendar, but its promoters remained upbeat.

headline.main: Formula One Race in New Jersey Is Delayed Again
headline.print_headline: Formula One Eliminates New Jersey Race in 2014
